description:

- New white paint throughout

- New Green Cabinets

4 bedroom, 1 bath, corner situated, 3 story, brick front property that is 17 feet wide, offering over 1,900 square feet of living space, and includes a private yard.
Low profile radiant heat and 4 new high efficiency mini splits throughout which were installed January 2020, climate control in this turn of the century home is a breeze.
The 2nd floor has 2 bedrooms and a large hall bath. The front bedroom has a beautiful marble mantle and a double wide built in closet and the middle bedroom has a large built in closet as well. The 3rd floor includes 2 equally spacious bedrooms. The front bedroom has a double wide wardrobe with glass slider doors that have built-in led lights.
The luxury of having so many rooms at your disposal creates an opportunity to craft a living space that fits your needs such as a home office, guest rooms, a studio, a den, study, etc.
The basement level is absolutely huge with more than 6 feet of head room and a speckled painted floor It has a laundry area and endless storage options.
The location is a walkers paradise as well since it is in close proximity to a variety of restaurants, cafes, shopping, and social spots in Old Kensington, Fishtown, and Northern Liberties such as Helm, Luna Cafe, Reanimator, Hook & Master, Front St Cafe, Laser Wolf, Streetside, etc. Nearby parks such as Cruz Playground, Benson Park, Hancock Playground, Liberty Lands Park.

description:

Updated kitchen appliances and updated fixtures throughout the house.
Each unit gets 1 assigned parking space in the private lot right next to the house for parking after business hours and on weekends, but there are extra spaces in the lot that you can park. There is also lots of street parking available, which you can park in anytime.

-the rack in the kitchen which we use as extra storage and counter space
-the blue pull-out couch
-the coffee bar
-storage racks in the closets (not pictured, but they’re like shorter versions of the kitchen rack)
-the over-the-toilet rack
-and anything else that catches your eye!
Please don’t hesitate to message if you’re interested, and we can answer any questions and work out a time for you to come see the apartment.
